thread.title: Surprise! Minecraft Pocket Edition beta 1.0.3 lists Windows 10 Mobile support
thread.title_full: Surprise! Minecraft Pocket Edition beta 1.0.3 lists Windows 10 Mobile support

author: Jez Corden
title: Surprise! Minecraft Pocket Edition beta 1.0.3 lists Windows 10 Mobile support
text:
Recently, we discovered that Minecraft Pocket Edition's development had been shut down on Windows phone devices, leaving us with another dead service on the platform.
Thankfully, it turns out that Microsoft had other plans all along. On the Minecraft Pocket Edition subreddit , a user submitted a changelog for version 1.0.3 beta, which includes "Windows Phone 10" support.
